GRADUATES: FOOD SAFETY

Unemployed GRADUATES in Food Safety are invited to apply for the 12-month YES for Youth Work Experience Programme

QUALIFICATION CRITERIA
Completed a Tertiary Qualification in Food Science, Food Technology, Microbiology, Public Health or related disciplines.
Any learnings and exposure to Food Safety Management Systems
Certification e.g. ISO 22000, FSSC 22000, BRC, HACCP, PRP’s

Criteria for eligibility:
South African Citizen, clear criminal record
Must be 18 – 28 years old
Completed and Passed a Degree Qualification
Currently unemployed and NOT studying full time
Should NOT have participated in YES previously

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/rsuMxKrBmb7x5bbE9
